identity: As Rama-Tut unknown to the general populace of Earth.
knownrelatives:
Unidentified mother and father; 
Nathaniel & Cassandra Richards, their unidentified son, and matriarch of the Eyriennes (ancestors); Tara (Huntara), Reed Richards (Mr. Fantastic), Franklin and Valeria Richards, various Eyriennes (common ancestry); Victor Von Doom (alleged ancestor); Ramades (son), Marcus Kang I-XXIII (sons, deceased), Marcus Immortus (son, deceased); Kang,Immortus, Scarlet Centurion, Iron Lad, and numerous other alternate dimensional counterparts and their offspring; possibly terminal Ravonna (wife, deceased)
significantissues: While behind the scenes, Immortus stranded Rama-Tut in heroic age,there he observed Doctor Doom meeting younger Rama-Tut (Avengers #269/Fantastic Four Annual #2, 1986/1964)
